p: To collect cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), there-day-old WT mice were sacrificed and removed the entire spine of the mouse, 10 μl of CSF was aspirated with microsyringe, and then diluted in 1ml PBS. Finally, 200 μl diluted CSF was subjected to ELISA assay to detect IL-6 protein expression using mouse IL-6 ELISA kit (4A Biotech Co. Ltd; Beijing, China), or RNA extraction to measure EV71 RNA copies.
